item.title: Stephen add a quote by Richard Dawkins
item.description: "More generally, as I shall repeat in Chapter 8, one of the truly bad effects of religion is that it teaches us that it is a virtue to be satisfied with not understanding." -- Richard Dawkins

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Gene Roddenberry
item.description: "We must question the story logic of having an all-knowing all-powerful God, who creates faulty Humans, and then blames them for his own mistakes." -- Gene Roddenberry

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Music has always been a matter of Energy to me, a question of Fuel. Sentimental people call it Inspiration, but what they really mean is Fuel. I have always needed Fuel. I am a serious consumer. On some nights I still believe that a car with the gas needle on empty can run about fifty more miles if you have the right music very loud on the radio." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Robert Pollard
item.description: "What shitty band are you in?" -- Robert Pollard

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "It is awfully hard work doing nothing. However, I don't mind hard work where there is no definite object of any kind. -Algernon" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Hearts Live By Being Wounded" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Stephen add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional." -- Hunter S. Thompson
